post.desc:
To clarify:

- Toyohime is Toyotamahime.
- Toyotamahime's husband is Hoori.
- Hoori's mother is Konohanasakuyahime.
- Konohanasakuyahime's older sister is Iwanagahime.
- Iwanagahime is Ariya.

For additional information, please consult [**this chart.**](https://www.reddit.com/r/touhou/comments/1b9ol78/touhou_divine_genealogy_illustrated/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web3x&utm_name=web3xcss&utm_term=1&utm_content=share_button)

And this Jojo reference is [**Wekapipo's brother-in-law**](https://jojowiki.com/Unnamed_Characters/Part_7#Wekapipo's_Brother-in-Law).
